org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: Pull Docker Image & Docker Image Run

ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntu@ec2-43-200-50-204.ap-northeast-2.compute.amazonaws.com 'docker ps -q --filter name=eroom-api-compose | grep -q . && docker rm -f $(docker ps -aq --filter name=eroom-api-compose)'
